transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine and I'm so excited because today we have got one of the Mavic 2 Zoom here to test out. There are two new drones in the Mavic family. There's this one. This is the Zoom and there is the Mavic 2 Pro version. Now what's exciting is both of these drones are the first of their kind in portable consumer drones. The Pro version has a Hasselblad camera with a 1 inch sensor and this one has a 24-48 mm optical zoom. I cannot wait to try out both versions, but today we've got the Zoom, so let's un-box. I'm also excited about the upgraded flight time. It says we'll get 31 minutes, which is great because more flight time, means more fun. (upbeat techno music) So here it is. We have got the controller. Looks to be a little bit bigger than a previous version and here's our drone-you're beefy! It does have a little bit of weight to it. It does feel a little heavier than the previous Mavic and by heavier, I mean, barely. Another box, another box, and another one. So before we get started, I want to give you guys a size comparison. So this is the Mavic Air and this is the brand new Mavic 2. So it is quite larger than the Mavic Air and now in comparison to the Mavic Pro Platinum. The Mavic 2 is a little bit taller. It's slightly heavier, like really not that much at all, but as for controllers, this is the Mavic Platinum. So this is a little bit thicker. One of the feature in the Mavic Air that I loved in the controller is the removable joysticks. They hide in here as a nice little storage compartment. That makes it so much easier to travel with these. So that's very exciting. Let's open this guy up and just see what it looks like all out. This looks like a much stronger gimbal than our previous versions. Oh yeah, this is industrial. This also now has Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing, so that basically will give you way more coverage if you are coming up on obstacles. It's not entirely 360. It has top and bottom, left and right, and front and back. The left and right is only available with active track and tripod mode, but for the most part this is going to provide you with some really great coverage as far as obstacle avoidance. Here's our battery. Let's take a look at this. Whoa, this is way bigger than the other Mavic battery is. Here's the Mavic Platinum and here's the brand new Mavic 2 battery and it is way bigger. So that battery's dead, so I'm going to need to charge those before we go out. It's got a cable charger, extra propellers, and of course the paperwork. So here's two different cords.
